name: ineffectually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not produce good results: She tried ineffectually to encourage him to eat. At one camp there are hundreds of huts, ineffectually thatched with straw. See
ineffectual
More examplesFewer examplesThey shouted ineffectually, trying to catch the foreman’s attention.She was working ineffectually on a PhD at the time, which she did not complete until many years later. At 4.30 a.m., I am ineffectually shooing my free-range herd downhill to the milking hut.
